tasks.title: Set up modular directory structure
tasks.description: Create the new directory structure with core/, frontend/, editor/, admin/, utils/, third-party/, and globals/ directories with index.ts barrel exports
tasks.details: Create the foundational directory structure for the refactored Elementor types library. This includes creating all main directories and their index.ts files to establish the modular organization pattern.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all directories are created and index.ts files can be imported without errors

tasks.title: Extract core module system types
tasks.description: Move Module, ViewModule, ArgsObject, and related core classes from types.ts to core/ directory
tasks.details: Extract the core ElementorModules namespace and all related classes including Module, ViewModule, ArgsObject, InstanceType, and ForceMethodImplementation from the monolithic types.ts file into the new core/ directory structure.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure all core module types compile correctly and can be imported from the new location

tasks.title: Extract frontend types and configuration
tasks.description: Move ElementorFrontend, ElementorFrontendConfig, and related frontend types to frontend/ directory
tasks.details: Separate all frontend-related types including the main ElementorFrontend interface, configuration types, and utility interfaces into the frontend module structure.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify frontend types are accessible and IntelliSense works correctly for frontend imports

tasks.title: Extract and organize handler types
tasks.description: Move all handler-related types (BaseHandler, SwiperHandler, etc.) to frontend/handlers/ directory
tasks.details: Organize all element handlers, widget handlers, and specialized handlers like SwiperHandler into a dedicated handlers subdirectory within frontend.
tasks.testStrategy: Confirm all handler types are properly exported and can be imported for widget development

tasks.title: Extract editor types and components
tasks.description: Move ElementorEditor, Panel, HistoryManager, and other editor types to editor/ directory
tasks.details: Separate all editor-specific types including the main editor interface, panel components, history management, and editor utilities into the editor module.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure editor plugin development can import necessary types from the new editor module

tasks.title: Extract command system types
tasks.description: Move the $e namespace and command system types to editor/commands/ directory
tasks.details: Organize the entire command system including the $e namespace, component registry, routes, and command execution types into a dedicated commands module.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify command system types work correctly for editor command development

tasks.title: Extract control system types
tasks.description: Move all control-related types and interfaces to editor/controls/ directory
tasks.details: Organize all control types, base control classes, and control-specific interfaces into the controls module for better organization of the editor control system.
tasks.testStrategy: Confirm control types are properly accessible for custom control development

tasks.title: Extract utility types and helpers
tasks.description: Move shared utilities like hooks, events, and breakpoints to utils/ directory
tasks.details: Separate all shared utility types including hooks system, event handling, breakpoint management, and other cross-cutting concerns into the utils module.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure utility types are accessible from multiple modules and work correctly

tasks.title: Extract third-party integration types
tasks.description: Move Swiper, jQuery augmentations, and other third-party types to third-party/ directory
tasks.details: Organize all third-party library integrations including Swiper extensions, jQuery augmentations, and other external library type definitions.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify third-party integrations work correctly and don't conflict with base library types

tasks.title: Extract global declarations
tasks.description: Move Window interface augmentations and global declarations to globals/ directory
tasks.details: Separate all global type augmentations including Window interface extensions, global variable declarations, and ambient module declarations.
tasks.testStrategy: Confirm global declarations are properly applied and accessible throughout the type system

tasks.title: Create comprehensive index.ts with export strategy
tasks.description: Build the main index.ts file with namespace exports and direct exports for the new modular structure
tasks.details: Create a comprehensive index.ts that provides multiple export patterns: namespace exports for grouped access, direct exports for common types, and helper types. This will be the single source of truth for all type exports.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all import patterns work correctly and IntelliSense provides appropriate suggestions

tasks.title: Add helper types and type guards
tasks.description: Create utility types like ElementSettings, ResponsiveValue, and type guard functions
tasks.details: Add developer-friendly helper types and utility functions to improve the developer experience, including generic types for element settings and responsive values.
tasks.testStrategy: Test helper types work correctly in typical usage scenarios and provide good IntelliSense

tasks.title: Add comprehensive JSDoc documentation
tasks.description: Add detailed JSDoc comments to key interfaces and provide usage examples
tasks.details: Add comprehensive documentation including JSDoc comments for all major interfaces, usage examples for common scenarios, and developer guidance for the new modular structure.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify documentation appears correctly in IntelliSense and provides helpful guidance to developers

tasks.title: Validate TypeScript compilation and testing
tasks.description: Ensure all modules compile correctly and set up type testing infrastructure
tasks.details: Validate that the entire refactored type system compiles correctly, all imports resolve properly, and set up infrastructure for ongoing type testing.
tasks.testStrategy: Run TypeScript compilation, import resolution tests, and verify no regression in type checking behavior

tasks.title: Complete Type Inventory Analysis
tasks.description: Extract and catalog all type definitions from original src/types.ts file
tasks.details: Systematically parse the original src/types.ts file to create a complete inventory of all interfaces, classes, enums, type aliases, namespaces, and exports. Document each type's name, location, signature, and dependencies.

tasks.title: Export Accessibility Verification
tasks.description: Verify all types from original file are accessible in new modular structure
tasks.details: Test that every type identified in the inventory can be imported and used from the new modular structure. Check direct imports, namespace imports, and barrel exports.

tasks.title: Type Signature Validation
tasks.description: Compare type signatures between original and refactored versions
tasks.details: Verify that method signatures, property types, optional/required status, generic parameters, and inheritance relationships are exactly preserved in the refactored version.

tasks.title: Namespace Structure Verification
tasks.description: Verify namespace structure preservation and accessibility
tasks.details: Check that all original namespaces (ElementorModules, $e, etc.) are preserved or properly converted. Ensure nested namespace hierarchies work and cross-namespace references resolve correctly.

tasks.title: Module Integration Testing
tasks.description: Test cross-module dependencies and type relationships
tasks.details: Verify that types referencing other types across modules work correctly. Test circular dependency resolution, type augmentations, and global declarations merge properly.

tasks.title: Build and Declaration Verification
tasks.description: Verify TypeScript compilation and generated declarations
tasks.details: Ensure TypeScript compilation produces no errors or warnings. Verify generated declaration files include all types and that IntelliSense provides complete type information.

tasks.title: Legacy Compatibility Testing
tasks.description: Test backward compatibility for existing consumers
tasks.details: Verify that existing import patterns still work and that no breaking changes were introduced. Test legacy usage scenarios and ensure migration path is seamless.

tasks.title: Final Parity Certification Report
tasks.description: Generate comprehensive parity verification report
tasks.details: Compile all verification results into a comprehensive report documenting 100% parity achievement, any improvements made, and certification that the refactored version is ready for production use.

metadata.description: Tasks for verifying 100% parity between refactored modular structure and original monolithic types.ts file
